channel.title: Battlescape background
channel.description: I can't find it, i'm using tom's cache suite and i look in images then i looked in title,media, and image or whatever it is. I can't find the backgound to change, i'm not sure if i'm looking in the right place. Please help,thanks.

item.title: Battlescape background
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

Make sure there are NO hidden files. if there are, try doing this.

1.right click inside the folder
2. Click “properties”
3. you should see something that says attributes, click hidden and check the box.
4. press OK and exit. the everything will disappear, do not worry xD simply repeat the process but uncheck the box and hit ok again. this will simply unhide all the files that are specifically hidden. if your still having trouble, send me the download and i can try to find it myself. GOOD LUCK!!!

Read full topic
